author: Ferris Jabr
title: How realistic is Contagion? The movie doesn't skimp on science
description: Contagion was a film released in 2011 about a fictional pandemic of a virus called MEV-1 which kills between 25 and 30 per cent of those it infected. Here is our review of the film originally published in September 2011, now that it's on Netflix
content:
By Ferris Jabr
Matt Damon stars in Contagion as an ordinary citizen caught up in a global pandemic
Claudette Barius ©Warner Bros Entertainment Inc
This review was originally published in September 2011.
It’s hard to name many Hollywood blockbusters that a… [+5141 chars]
